definition: to creatively combine learning with usage/to learn and apply pragmatically
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: English, as a living language, is changing all the time.

sentences.english: So it's something you should learn easily and use often.

sentences.english: Vocabulary teaching should comprise the content of helping students "study and use vividly".

sentences.english: True love can only be put to the proof in hardship.
sentences.chinese: 真爱只能在艰难中得以考验，活学活用。
